					}

			multiply_variable = { 
				which = kdu

			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = kdv
				value = 0.02
			}
			multiply_variable = { 
				which = kdw
				value = 0.02
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adv
							which = adv
						}
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = awp
								which = kdu
							}
						}
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = awp
						which = kdu
					}
				}
				else = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdu
						which = awp
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = awp
						value = 0
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = {

							}
						}
					}

					}

							}
						}
					}
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = awr
						which = kdw
					}
				}
				else = {

						which = kdw
						which = awr
					}

						which = awr
						value = 0
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = aeh
					which = awp
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = aei
					which = awq
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = adw
					which = awr
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aaw
									value = 0
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = aeh
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aeh
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aeh
						which = aaw
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aax

									which = aax
									value = 0
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aes
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aes
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aes
						which = aax
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aay
									value = 0
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aeg
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aeg
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = { 
					divide_variable = { 
						which = aeg
						which = aay
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = axw
					which = aer
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = axx
					which = aes
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = axy
					which = aeg
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = axw
					value = 100
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = axx
					value = 100
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = axy
					value = 100
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ayq
					which = axe
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ayq
					which = axf
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ayq
					which = axg
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ayw
					which = ayq
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ayw
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
					}
					divide_variable = { 
						which = ayw
						which = aaz
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = ayw
						value = 100
					}
				}
			}
			set_province_flag = DG_Update
			set_variable = { 
				which = kdu
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = kdv
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = kdw
				value = 0
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adv
							value = 5
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = jwg
					value = 3
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adx
							value = 5
						}
					}
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = jwh
					value = 3
				}
			}
			else_if = {

				}
				change_variable = {

				}
			}

					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = dg_rc_80
						duration = -1
						hidden = yes

					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_60
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_70
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_90
				}
				else_if = {

						AND = { 
							check_variable = {

						}

				else_if = {

						AND = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = opw
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_10
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_20
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_30
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_40
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_50

					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_70
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_80
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_90
				}
				else = { 
					set_variable = { 
						which = opw
						value = 0
					}
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_10
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_20
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_30
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_40
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_50
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_60
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_70
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_80
					remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_90
				}
			}
		}
	}
	after = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			owner = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = DG_Waldensians.002
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Waldensians.002
	title = "DG_Waldensians.002.title"
	desc = "DG_Waldensians.002.desc"
	picture = all_church_state
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Waldensians.002.opta"
		trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = wal_spread_info
			set_country_flag = wal_inquis_info
			set_country_flag = wal_convert_info
			set_country_flag = wal_unrest_info
			set_country_flag = wal_end_info
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Waldensians.002.optb"
		trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_country_flag = wal_spread_info
			clr_country_flag = wal_inquis_info
			clr_country_flag = wal_convert_info
			clr_country_flag = wal_unrest_info
			clr_country_flag = wal_end_info
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Waldensians.002.optc"
		trigger = { 
			ai = no
		}
		country_event = { 
			id = DG_Notification.051
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "EVT_AI"
		trigger = { 
			ai = yes
		}
	}
	after = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
				}
			}
			hidden_effect = { 
				set_country_flag = waldensian_presence
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Waldensians.011
	title = "DG_Waldensians.011.title"
	desc = { 
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = support_05
		}
		desc = "DG_Waldensians.011.des1"
	}
	desc = { 
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = accept_05
		}
		desc = "DG_Waldensians.011.des2"
	}
	desc = { 
		trigger = { 
			has_country_flag = silence_05
		}
		desc = "DG_Waldensians.011.des3"
	}
	picture = all_church_state
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		NOT = { 
			religion = waldensian
		}
		OR = { 
			has_country_flag = support_05
			has_country_flag = accept_05
			has_country_flag = silence_05
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_ruler_modifier = tolerant_society
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_ruler_modifier = religious_intolerance
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_ruler_modifier = heretic_tolerance
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Waldensians.001.opta"
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_ruler_modifier = tolerant_society
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_ruler_modifier = religious_intolerance
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			set_country_flag = support_05
			clr_country_flag = accept_05
			clr_country_flag = silence_05
			add_ruler_modifier = { 
				name = "heretic_tolerance"
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = opw
				value = -10
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = opw
							value = 90
						}
					}
				}
				add_country_modifier = { 
					name = dg_rc_90
					duration = -1
					hidden = yes
				}
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_10
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_20
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_30
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_40
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_50
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_60
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_70
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_80
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = opw
							value = 80
						}
					}
				}
				add_country_modifier = { 
					name = dg_rc_80
					duration = -1
					hidden = yes
				}
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_10
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_20
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_30

				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_50
				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_60

				remove_country_modifier = dg_rc_80

	option = { 
		name = "DG_Waldensians.001.optc"
		trigger = { 
			NOT = { 
				has_ruler_modifier = heretic_tolerance
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_ruler_modifier = tolerant_society
			}
		}

			clr_country_flag = support_05
			clr_country_flag = accept_05
			set_country_flag = silence_05
			add_ruler_modifier = { 
				name = "religious_intolerance"
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = opw
				value = 10
			}

				limit = {

country_event = { 
	id = DG_Waldensians.100
	title = "DG_Waldensians.100.title"
	desc = "DG_Waldensians.100.desc"
	picture = all_church_state
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
				}
			}
			country_event = { 
				id = DG_Waldensians.101
			}
			set_country_flag = waldensian_presence
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				had_country_flag = { 
					flag = waldensian_presence
					days = 36500
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				1 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Waldensians.101
					}
				}
				99 = { }
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				had_country_flag = { 
					flag = waldensian_presence
					days = 27375
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				5 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Waldensians.101
					}
				}
				95 = { }
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				had_country_flag = { 
					flag = waldensian_presence
					days = 18250
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				10 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Waldensians.101
					}
				}
				90 = { }
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				had_country_flag = { 
					flag = waldensian_presence
					days = 10950
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				15 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Waldensians.101
					}
				}
				85 = { }
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random_list = { 
				20 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Waldensians.101
					}
				}
				80 = { }
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = DG_Waldensians.101
	title = "DG_Waldensians.001.title"
	desc = "DG_Waldensians.101.desc"
	picture = all_church_state
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "EVT_AI"
		random_province = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					is_religion_enabled = reformed
				}
				NOT = { 
					OR = { 
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = adv
								value = 5
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = adx
								value = 5
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = adz
								value = 5
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aeb
								value = 5
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aed
								value = 5
							}
						}
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aef
								value = 5
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = { 
					any_neighbor_province = { 
						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adv
									value = 5
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adx
									value = 5
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adz
									value = 5
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aeb
									value = 5
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aed
									value = 5
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aef
									value = 5
								}
							}
						}
					}
					any_neighbor_province = { 
						any_neighbor_province = { 
							OR = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adv
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adx
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adz
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aeb
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aed
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aef
										value = 5
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				religion = catholic
			}
			province_event = { 
				id = DG_Waldensians.102
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = DG_Waldensians.102
	title = "DG_Waldensians.001.title"
	desc = "DG_Waldensians.102.desc"
	picture = all_church_state
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { }
	option = { 
		name = "EVT_AI"
		hidden_effect = { 
			random_list = { 
				10 = { 
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adv
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adx
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adz

									}
								}

									}
								}

									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aed

									}
								}

									}

							which = qae
							value = 5

						which = ked

					}

									}
								}
							}
						}

							which = aeq
							which = axc
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aee
							which = axd
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aaw
											value = 0
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aep
											value = 0.001
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aep
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							divide_variable = { 
								which = aep
								which = aaw
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aax
											value = 0
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aeq
											value = 0.001
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aeq
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							divide_variable = { 
								which = aeq
								which = aax
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aay
											value = 0
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aee
											value = 0.001
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aee
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							divide_variable = { 
								which = aee
								which = aay
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = axt
							which = aep
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = axu
							which = aeq
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = axv
							which = aee
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = axt
							value = 100
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = axu
							value = 100
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = axv
							value = 100
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ayp
							which = axb
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ayp
							which = axc
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ayp
							which = axd
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ayv
							which = ayp
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ayv
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
							divide_variable = { 
								which = ayv
								which = aaz
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ayv
								value = 100
							}
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aef
									value = 5
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = axe
							which = kdu
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = axf
							which = kdv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = axg
							which = kdw
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aer
							which = axe
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aes
							which = axf
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aeg
							which = axg
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aaw
											value = 0
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aer
											value = 0.001
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aer
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							divide_variable = { 
								which = aer
								which = aaw
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aax
											value = 0
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aes
											value = 0.001
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aes
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							divide_variable = { 
								which = aes
								which = aax
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								OR = { 
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aay
											value = 0
										}
									}
									AND = { 
										is_variable_equal = { 
											which = aeg
											value = 0.001
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = aeg
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = { 
							divide_variable = { 
								which = aeg
								which = aay
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = axw
							which = aer
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = axx
							which = aes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = axy
							which = aeg
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = axw
							value = 100
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = axx
							value = 100
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = axy
							value = 100
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ayq
							which = axe
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ayq
							which = axf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ayq
							which = axg
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ayw
							which = ayq
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ayw
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
							divide_variable = { 
								which = ayw
								which = aaz
							}
							multiply_variable = { 
								which = ayw
								value = 100
							}
						}
					}
					set_province_flag = DG_Update
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdu
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdv
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = kdw
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adv
									value = 5
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = jwg
							value = 3
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adx
									value = 5
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = jwh
							value = 3
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = adz
									value = 5
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = jwi
							value = 3
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aeb
									value = 5
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = jwj
							value = 3
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aed
									value = 5
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = jwk
							value = 3
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								is_variable_equal = { 
									which = aef
									value = 5
								}
							}
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = jwl
							value = 3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									NOT = { 
										has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
									}
									AND = { 
										has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
										has_country_flag = wal_spread_info
									}
								}
							}
						}
						province_event = { 
							id = DG_Waldensians.108
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

		name = "OPT.ISEE"
		trigger = { 
			owner = { 
				has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
			}
		}
	}
	after = { 
		owner = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Waldensians.002
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { 
		name = "OPT.ISEE"
		trigger = { 
			owner = { 
				has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
			}
		}
	}
	after = { 
		owner = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Waldensians.002
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { 
		name = "OPT.ISEE"
		trigger = { 
			owner = { 
				has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
			}
		}
	}
	after = { 
		owner = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Waldensians.002
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { 
		name = "OPT.ISEE"
		trigger = { 
			owner = { 
				has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
			}
		}
	}
	after = { 
		owner = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Waldensians.002
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

	option = { 
		name = "OPT.ISEE"
		trigger = { 
			owner = { 
				has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
			}
		}
	}
	after = { 
		owner = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_country_flag = waldensian_presence
					}
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = DG_Waldensians.002
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = DG_Waldensians.111
	title = "DG_Waldensians.111.title"
	desc = "DG_Waldensians.111.desc"
	picture = all_church_state
	hidden = yes
	trigger = { 
		always = no
		is_religion_enabled = waldensian
		owner = { 
			NOT = { 
				religion = waldensian
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = adv
					value = 5
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = adx
					value = 5
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = adz
					value = 5
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = aeb
					value = 5
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = aed
					value = 5
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = aef
					value = 5
				}
			}
		}
		NOT = { 
			is_religion_enabled = reformed
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 25
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.9
			region = west_italy_region
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.7
			OR = { 
				region = provence_region

						which = axu

					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = axv
						value = 100
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ayp
						which = axb
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ayp
						which = axc
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ayp
						which = axd
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ayv
						which = ayp
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ayv
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = ayv
							which = aaz
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ayv
							value = 100
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						AND = { 
							is_variable_equal = { 
								which = aef
								value = 5
							}
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = axe
						which = kdu
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = axf
						which = kdv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = axg
						which = kdw
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aer
						which = axe
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aes
						which = axf
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aeg
						which = axg
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aaw
										value = 0
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aer
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aer
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aer
							which = aaw
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aax
										value = 0
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aes
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aes
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aes
							which = aax
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							OR = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aay
										value = 0
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aeg
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aeg
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = { 
						divide_variable = { 
							which = aeg
							which = aay
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = axw
						which = aer
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = axx
						which = aes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = axy
						which = aeg
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = axw
						value = 100
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = axx
						value = 100
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = axy
						value = 100
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ayq
						which = axe
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ayq
						which = axf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ayq
						which = axg
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ayw
						which = ayq
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							AND = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ayw
									value = 0.001
								}
							}
						}
						divide_variable = { 
							which = ayw
							which = aaz
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = ayw
							value = 100
						}
					}
				}
				set_province_flag = DG_Update
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdu
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdv
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kdw
					value = 0
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adv
							value = 5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = azz
					value = 100
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adx
							value = 5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = baa
					value = 100
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adz
							value = 5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = bab
					value = 100
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = aeb
							value = 5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = bac
					value = 100
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = aed
							value = 5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = bad
					value = 100
				}
			}
			else_if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = aef
							value = 5
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = bae
					value = 100
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

province_event = { 
	id = DG_Waldensians.118
	title = "DG_Waldensians.118.title"
	desc = "DG_Waldensians.118.desc"
	picture = ANGLICAN_SERMON_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		has_province_flag = printing_press_p
		NOT = { 
			religion_years = { 
				waldensian = 50
			}
		}
		AND = { 
			continent = europe
			religion = waldensian
			NOT = { 
				province_id = 2530
			}
			is_reformation_center = no
			is_island = no
			expelling_minorities = no
			development = 10
			NOT = { 
				Academia = 100
			}
			NOT = { 
				current_age = age_of_revolutions
			}
			NOT = { 
				calc_true_if = { 
					all_province = { 
						continent = europe
						religion = ROOT
						is_reformation_center = yes
					}
					amount = 3
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				any_neighbor_province = { 
					is_reformation_center = yes
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				any_province = { 
					superregion = PREV
					is_reformation_center = yes
					religion = waldensian
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_climate = tropical
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_climate = arid
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_climate = arctic
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_terrain = arctic
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_terrain = taiga
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_terrain = tundra
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			religion = waldensian
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 5
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			has_province_flag = wal_craddle
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.5
			province_id = 1389
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 5.0
			owner = { 
				has_country_flag = accept_05
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 10.0
			owner = { 
				has_country_flag = silence_05
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.GOOD"
		trigger = { 
			owner = { 
				religion = waldensian
			}
		}
		add_reform_center = waldensian
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_province_modifier = religious_enthusiasm
			}
			extend_province_modifier = { 
				name = religious_enthusiasm
				duration = 3650
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = religious_enthusiasm
				duration = 3650
				hidden = yes
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.DAMN"
		trigger = { 
			owner = { 
				NOT = { 
					religion = waldensian
				}
			}
		}
		add_reform_center = waldensian
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_province_modifier = heretic_centre
			}
			extend_province_modifier = { 
				name = heretic_centre
				duration = 3650
			}
		}
		else = { 
			add_province_modifier = { 
				name = heretic_centre
				duration = 3650
				hidden = yes
			}
		}
	}
}

			}
		}
		OR = { 
			AND = {

				}
				AND = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = jwl
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 20
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.20
			OR = { 
				AND = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adv
							value = 5
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = jxd
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adx
							value = 5
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = jxe
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adz
							value = 5
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = jxf
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {

						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = aeb

						}
					}
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = jxg
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = aed
							value = 5
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = jxh
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = aef
							value = 5
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = jxi
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.EXCELLENT"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = adv
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwg
				value = -1
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = adx
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwh
				value = -1
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = adz
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwi
				value = -1
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aeb
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwj
				value = -1
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aed
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwk
				value = -1
			}
		}
		else_if = {

				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aef
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwl
				value = -1
			}
		}
		if = {

					has_country_flag = wal_inquis_info
				}
			}
			province_event = { 
				id = DG_Waldensians.202
			}
		}
	}

				value = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aeb
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = bac
				value = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aed
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = bad
				value = 5
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aef
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = bae
				value = 5
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					has_country_flag = wal_inquis_info
				}
			}
			province_event = { 
				id = DG_Waldensians.204
			}
		}
	}
}

	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = DG_Waldensians.205
	title = "DG_Waldensians.205.title"
	desc = "DG_Waldensians.205.desc"
	picture = all_church_state
	hidden = yes
	trigger = { 
		is_religion_enabled = waldensian
		owner = { 
			NOT = { 
				religion = waldensian
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			AND = { 
				AND = {

						which = adv
						value = 5
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					check_variable = {

						value = 2
					}
				}

						which = azy
						value = 2
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 25
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.20
			OR = { 
				AND = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adv
							value = 5
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = jxd
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
				}
				AND = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adx
							value = 5
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = jxe
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
				}
				AND = {

							which = adz
							value = 5
						}
					}
					AND = {

					}

							which = aef
							value = 5
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = jxi
							value = 0.1
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "DG_Waldensians.205.opta"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = adv
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = azt
				value = -2
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = adx

					}
				}
			}

		else_if = {

						which = aeb
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = azw

			}
		}

									check_variable = { 
										which = amn
										value = 0.5
									}
								}
							}
							subtract_variable = {

							}
							add_devastation = 0.5

										value = 0.25

							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = kdt
							value = 0
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							owner = { 
								has_country_flag = wal_unrest_info
							}
						}
						set_province_flag = mn_trauma_90
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					has_country_flag = wal_unrest_info
				}
			}
			province_event = { 
				id = DG_Waldensians.302
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = DG_Waldensians.302
	title = "DG_Waldensians.301.title"
	desc = "DG_Waldensians.301.desc"
	picture = all_church_state
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.OHNO"
		trigger_switch = { 
			on_trigger = has_province_flag
			mn_trauma_10 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_trauma_10_tt
			}
			mn_trauma_20 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_trauma_20_tt
			}
			mn_trauma_30 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_trauma_30_tt
			}
			mn_trauma_40 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_trauma_40_tt
			}
			mn_trauma_50 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_trauma_50_tt
			}
			mn_trauma_60 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_trauma_60_tt
			}
			mn_trauma_70 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_trauma_70_tt
			}
			mn_trauma_80 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_trauma_80_tt
			}
			mn_trauma_90 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_trauma_90_tt
			}
		}
	}
	after = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_province_flag = mn_trauma_10
			clr_province_flag = mn_trauma_20
			clr_province_flag = mn_trauma_30
			clr_province_flag = mn_trauma_40
			clr_province_flag = mn_trauma_50
			clr_province_flag = mn_trauma_60
			clr_province_flag = mn_trauma_70
			clr_province_flag = mn_trauma_80
			clr_province_flag = mn_trauma_90
		}
	}
}

						OR = { 
							AND = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adv
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ayr
										value = 20
									}
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adx
										value = 5
									}

						limit = { 
							has_province_modifier = MN_low_U.16
						}

							name = MN_low_U.16
							duration = 3650
						}
					}
					else = {

							}
							AND = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = adz
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ayt
										value = 80
									}
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aeb
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ayu
										value = 80
									}
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aed
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ayv
										value = 80
									}
								}
							}
							AND = { 
								AND = { 
									is_variable_equal = { 
										which = aef
										value = 5
									}
								}
								AND = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = ayw
										value = 80
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_modifier = MN_max_U.16
						}
						extend_province_modifier = { 
							name = MN_max_U.16
							duration = 3650
						}
					}
					else = { 
						add_province_modifier = { 
							name = MN_max_U.16
							duration = 3650
							hidden = yes
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							owner = { 
								has_country_flag = wal_unrest_info
							}
						}
						set_province_flag = mn_unrest_max_10
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					has_country_flag = wal_unrest_info
				}
			}
			province_event = { 
				id = DG_Waldensians.312
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = DG_Waldensians.312
	title = "DG_Waldensians.311.title"
	desc = "DG_Waldensians.311.desc"
	picture = all_church_state
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.OHNO"
		trigger_switch = { 
			on_trigger = has_province_flag
			mn_unrest_min_1 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_min_1_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_min_5 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_min_2_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_min_10 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_min_3_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_low_1 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_low_1_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_low_5 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_low_2_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_low_10 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_low_3_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_mid_1 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_mid_1_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_mid_5 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_mid_2_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_mid_10 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_mid_3_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_imp_1 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_imp_1_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_imp_5 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_imp_2_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_imp_10 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_imp_3_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_max_1 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_max_1_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_max_5 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_max_2_tt
			}
			mn_unrest_max_10 = { 
				custom_tooltip = mn_unrest_max_3_tt
			}
		}
	}
	after = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_min_1
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_min_5
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_min_10
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_low_1
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_low_5
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_low_10
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_mid_1
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_mid_5
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_mid_10
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_imp_1
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_imp_5
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_imp_10
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_max_1
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_max_5
			clr_province_flag = mn_unrest_max_10
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = DG_Waldensians.901
	title = "DG_Waldensians.901.title"
	desc = "DG_Waldensians.901.desc"
	picture = all_church_state
	hidden = yes
	trigger = { 
		is_religion_enabled = reformed
		OR = { 
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = adv
					value = 5
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = adx
					value = 5
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = adz
					value = 5
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = aeb
					value = 5
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = aed
					value = 5
				}
			}
			AND = { 
				is_variable_equal = { 
					which = aef
					value = 5
				}
			}
		}
		OR = { 
			owner = { 
				religion = reformed
			}
			AND = { 
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adv
							value = 3
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adx
							value = 3
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adz
							value = 3
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = aeb
							value = 3
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = aed
							value = 3
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = aef
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				OR = { 
					NOT = { 
						owner = { 
							religion = waldensian
						}
					}
					NOT = { 
						religion_years = { 
							reformed = 75
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		months = 30
		modifier = { 
			factor = 1.25
			owner = { 
				religion = waldensian
				stability = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.75
			owner = { 
				religion = waldensian
				NOT = { 
					stability = -1
				}
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 0.75
			owner = { 
				religion = reformed
				stability = 3
			}
		}
		modifier = { 
			factor = 1.25
			owner = { 
				religion = reformed
				NOT = { 
					stability = -1
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = "OPT.ISEE"
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adv
							value = 3
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adx
							value = 3
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adz
							value = 3
						}
					}
					AND = {

							which = aeb

						}

						}

							which = aef

						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = qae
				value = 3
			}
			province_event = { 
				id = DG_Convert.903
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = qae
				value = 0
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = adv
						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					AND = { 
						is_variable_equal = { 
							which = adv
							value = 3
						}
					}
				}
				if = {

								which = aaw
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}

						which = aeh
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aeh
						value = 0
					}

					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aeb
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwj
				value = 0
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aed
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwk
				value = 0
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aef
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwl
				value = 0
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = adv
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwg
				value = 0
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = adx
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwh
				value = 0
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = adz
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwi
				value = 0
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aeb
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwj
				value = 0
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aed
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwk
				value = 0
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				AND = { 
					is_variable_equal = { 
						which = aef
						value = 3
					}
				}
			}
			change_variable = { 
				which = jwl
				value = 0
			}
		}
		set_province_flag = DG_Update
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				owner = { 
					has_country_flag = wal_end_info
				}
			}
			province_event = { 
				id = DG_Waldensians.902
			}
		}
	}
}
